Name: 异世界攻略组 Another World Adventure
About the game: Note: the game is currently in the EA stage, not complete development, the story of the game has not been implemented, please be careful to buy.Currently, combat mechanics and weapon systems are being optimized and reworked based on player feedback, and some of them have not been implemented yet, which may lead to a bad game experience.Because the gameplay is constantly changing, the novice guide is not implemented for the time being, and players can check the game's controls by looking at the in-game buttons. ___________The game story___________ Among the innumerable Isekai worlds in [Isekai team], some Isekai worlds are regarded as 'abnormal' by the ancient gods because of the appearance of 'demon king'. The ancient gods will use the power of erosion to destroy the Isekai world to prevent the 'abnormal' from spreading to other worlds. However, the residents of the destroyed Isekai world are obviously innocent. As the hero of the Isekai team, under the guidance of the divine emissary, you will solve the 'abnormal' crisis of different worlds and prevent them from being destroyed. And in the constant journey to the Isekai world, things seem to be moving in an unpredictable direction... ___________The game features___________ * Fight in real time, grow stronger and challenge more and more powerful enemies as you travel across isekai worlds. * Random levels, spacious scenes, dealing with enemies and events in different scenes, and the possibility of bad weather at any time. * Random weapon types and weapon enchant, get the weapon you think is appropriate to defeat the enemy, in the isekai world to search for more powerful weapons. * No need to unlock unique characters that can be freely played. Each character has a different talent and fighting style, and is able to wake up their own weapons by disintegrating the weapon fragments they acquire. * Provide support for permanent growth, each adventure earned by the divine gold allows you to strengthen yourself, stronger. * Adjustable strategy difficulty. The yggdrasil system in the divine world adjusts the difficulty of your Isekai world journey through the buffs and debuffs. ___________♦Update plan♦___________ * 1.
